thread.title: Danny Amendola made a ridiculous catch to help seal the game for the Patriots - Patriots
thread.title_full: Danny Amendola made a ridiculous catch to help seal the game for the Patriots - Patriots

author: Gary Dzen
title: Danny Amendola made a ridiculous catch to help seal the game for the Patriots - Patriots
text:
Danny Amendola made two enormous plays Sunday when the Patriots needed them most. The first, an eight-yard touchdown catch with 7:22 remaining in the fourth quarter, put the Patriots ahead of the New York Jets, 23-20.
But the second is the one that has everybody talking. Three minutes after the touchdown, with the Patriots driving again, Amendola hauled in a pass from Tom Brady along the right sideline. Brady’s pass appeared to be high. It didn’t matter.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Amendola is an animal pic.twitter.com/c8b3KIpfMS
— Pete Blackburn (@PeteBlackburn) October 25, 2015 Just a ridiculous catch pic.twitter.com/qM9nuia0SW
— Pete Blackburn (@PeteBlackburn) October 25, 2015 The catch set up a touchdown by Rob Gronkowski that sealed the game. Amendola finished with eight catches for 86 yards. Gronkowski was impressed.
Gronk on Amendola: "He looks like a gymnast half the time."
— Mark Daniels (@MarkDanielsPJ) October 25, 2015 Photos: The best images from Patriots-Jets
